typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductLabel as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductDescription as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as string,
		Manufacturer as string,
		BrandName as string,
		ClassID as integer,
		ClassName as string,
		StyleID as integer,
		StyleName as string,
		ColorID as integer,
		ColorName as string,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureID as string,
		Weight as float,
		WeightUnitMeasureID as integer,
		UnitOfMeasureID as string,
		UnitOfMeasureName as string,
		StockTypeID as integer,
		StockTypeName as string,
		UnitCost as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		AvailableForSaleDate as date,
		StopSaleDate as date,
		Status as string,
		ImageURL as string,
		ProductURL as string,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceProducts
source(output(
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		ProductSubcategoryLabel as integer,
		ProductSubcategoryName as string,
		ProductSubcategoryDescription as string,
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceProductsSubcategory
source(output(
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ProductCategoryLabel as integer,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		ProductCategoryDescription as string,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceProductsCategory
SourceProducts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductLabel as integer,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductDescription as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		Manufacturer as string,
		BrandName as string,
		ClassID as integer,
		ClassName as string,
		StyleID as integer,
		StyleName as string,
		ColorID as integer,
		ColorName as string,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureID as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,2),
		WeightUnitMeasureID as integer,
		UnitOfMeasureID as string,
		UnitOfMeasureName as string,
		StockTypeID as integer,
		StockTypeName as string,
		UnitCost as decimal(23,2),
		UnitPrice as decimal(23,2),
		AvailableForSaleDate as date,
		StopSaleDate as date,
		Status as string,
		ImageURL as string,
		ProductURL as string,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductKey,
		ProductLabel,
		ProductName,
		ProductDescription,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		Manufacturer,
		BrandName,
		ClassID,
		ClassName,
		StyleID,
		StyleName,
		ColorID,
		ColorName,
		Size,
		SizeRange,
		SizeUnitMeasureID,
		Weight,
		WeightUnitMeasureID,
		UnitOfMeasureID,
		UnitOfMeasureName,
		StockTypeID,
		StockTypeName,
		UnitCost,
		UnitPrice,
		AvailableForSaleDate,
		StopSaleDate,
		Status,
		ImageURL,
		ProductURL,
		ETLLoadID,
		LoadDate,
		UpdateDate
	)) ~> SinkProducts
sourceProductsCategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ProductCategoryLabel as integer,
		ProductCategoryName as string,
		ProductCategoryDescription as string,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryKey,
		ProductCategoryLabel,
		ProductCategoryName,
		ProductCategoryDescription,
		ETLLoadID,
		LoadDate,
		UpdateDate
	)) ~> SinkProductsCategory
SourceProductsSubcategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		ProductSubcategoryLabel as integer,
		ProductSubcategoryName as string,
		ProductSubcategoryDescription as string,
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ETLLoadID as integer,
		LoadDate as date,
		UpdateDate as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		ProductSubcategoryLabel,
		ProductSubcategoryName,
		ProductSubcategoryDescription,
		ProductCategoryKey,
		ETLLoadID,
		LoadDate,
		UpdateDate
	)) ~> SinkProductsSubcategory
